-- | convertible instances for ascii
--   
--   This package provides convertible instances for ascii:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>http://hackage.haskell.org/package/convertible-text</a></li>
--   <li><a>http://hackage.haskell.org/package/ascii</a></li>
--   </ul>
@package convertible-ascii
@version 0.1.0.1


-- | Instances to convert amongst <a>Ascii</a> strings and other things.
--   
--   Note that data types are re-exported only for the documentation
--   purpose. They'll disappear as soon as Haddock's issue #54
--   (<a>http://trac.haskell.org/haddock/ticket/54</a>) gets resolved. So
--   you should always import this module as:
--   
--   <pre>
--   import Data.Convertible.Instances.Ascii ()
--   </pre>
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Ascii
data Ascii :: *
type CIAscii = CI Ascii
data AsciiBuilder :: *
instance ConvertAttempt CIAscii Text
instance ConvertAttempt CIAscii String
instance ConvertAttempt CIAscii ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt CIAscii AsciiBuilder
instance ConvertAttempt CIAscii Ascii
instance ConvertAttempt AsciiBuilder Text
instance ConvertAttempt AsciiBuilder String
instance ConvertAttempt AsciiBuilder CIAscii
instance ConvertAttempt AsciiBuilder ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt AsciiBuilder Builder
instance ConvertAttempt AsciiBuilder Ascii
instance ConvertAttempt Ascii Text
instance ConvertAttempt Ascii String
instance ConvertAttempt Ascii CIAscii
instance ConvertAttempt Ascii ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Ascii AsciiBuilder
instance ConvertAttempt Text CIAscii
instance ConvertAttempt Text AsciiBuilder
instance ConvertAttempt Text Ascii
instance ConvertAttempt String CIAscii
instance ConvertAttempt String AsciiBuilder
instance ConvertAttempt String Ascii
instance ConvertSuccess CIAscii Text
instance ConvertSuccess CIAscii String
instance ConvertSuccess CIAscii ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess CIAscii AsciiBuilder
instance ConvertSuccess CIAscii Ascii
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString CIAscii
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString AsciiBuilder
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Ascii
instance ConvertSuccess AsciiBuilder Text
instance ConvertSuccess AsciiBuilder String
instance ConvertSuccess AsciiBuilder CIAscii
instance ConvertSuccess AsciiBuilder ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess AsciiBuilder Builder
instance ConvertSuccess AsciiBuilder Ascii
instance ConvertSuccess Ascii Text
instance ConvertSuccess Ascii String
instance ConvertSuccess Ascii CIAscii
instance ConvertSuccess Ascii ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Ascii AsciiBuilder
